item.title: About
item.description: Learn more about Yougeshwar Khatri, a cloud consultant with 12+ years of experience in AWS, Azure, Kubernetes, and DevOps automation. Helping businesses innovate through scalable solutions.

item.title: Certifications
item.description: Explore the certifications that demonstrate my expertise in cloud technologies, DevOps practices, and infrastructure automation, including AWS, Terraform, and HashiCorp certifications.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Get in touch with Yougeshwar Khatri, a cloud expert specializing in DevOps, AWS, Kubernetes, and Terraform. Let's discuss your next project!

item.description: Learn how I handle your privacy on this site.

item.title: Step-by-Step Guide: Setting Up Lambda@Edge for Authentication with Microsoft Entra ID (Azure AD) in AWS
item.description: A practical step-by-step guide to deploying and configuring AWS Lambda@Edge for authentication with Microsoft Entra ID (Azure AD). Learn how to secure your CloudFront distributions, validate JWT tokens at the edge, and deliver content faster with smarter request handling.
